Detailed Description

HavokObject Implementation of the ISystemObject interface. This is the base object created by the HavokPhysics Scene.

System::Type HavokObject::GetSystemType ( void   )  [protected, virtual]

Implementation of the ISystemObject::GetSystemType function. Lets this object know when a registered aspects of interest has changed (this function will be called when other systems make changes this object should know about).

Returns:
System::Type - Type of this system.
